name: Space Flight Fiasco
description:
The second game I've ever made, and the first one was for Ludum Dare and was not that great so it doesn't really count... Anyway, this is my first game for 1 Game a Month, even though I only started about a week before the end of the month, I really wanted to have one game for each month of the year.

Controls: W, A, S, D, to move, SPACE to shoot.
